languages.text: {n}Дама не врет вам, но и полностью искренней ее не назовешь. То, как она смотрит на обвиняемого, говорит о ненависти: давней и непримиримой. Так ненавидят врага.{/n}
{n}The woman is not lying, but neither is she being completely candid. The way she looks at the accused speaks of an old, inappeasable hatred, the kind one shows to one's true enemy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дама не врет вам, но и полностью искренней ее не назовешь. То, как она смотрит на обвиняемого, говорит о ненависти: давней и непримиримой. Так ненавидят врага.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman is not lying, but neither is she being completely candid. The way she looks at the accused speaks of old, inappeasable hatred, the kind one shows their enemy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个女人并没有说谎，但也没有对你完全坦白实情。她看着老人的目光中充满了无法平息的恨意，那是对真正敌人的刻骨仇恨。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman is not lying, but neither is she being completely candid. The way she looks at the accused speaks of an old, inappeasable hatred, the kind one shows to one's true enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个女人并没有说谎，但也没有对你完全坦白实情。她看着老人的目光中充满了无法平息的恨意，那是对真正敌人的刻骨仇恨。{/n}

languages.text: {n}その女性は嘘をついてはいないが、かといってすべてを正直に話しているわけでもない。彼女が被告を見るその目には、決して癒えることのない古い憎しみ──真の敵に向けるような憎悪がにじんでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman is not lying, but neither is she being completely candid. The way she looks at the accused speaks of an old, inappeasable hatred, the kind one shows to one's true enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その女性は嘘をついてはいないが、かといってすべてを正直に話しているわけでもない。彼女が被告を見るその目には、決して癒えることのない古い憎しみ──真の敵に向けるような憎悪がにじんでいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mujer no miente, pero tampoco está siendo del todo sincera. El modo en que mira al acusado denota una vieja rencilla, un odio visceral como el que solamente se profesa al peor de los enemigos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman is not lying, but neither is she being completely candid. The way she looks at the accused speaks of an old, inappeasable hatred, the kind one shows to one's true enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer no miente, pero tampoco está siendo del todo sincera. El modo en que mira al acusado denota una vieja rencilla, un odio visceral como el que solamente se profesa al peor de los enemigos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kadın yalan söylemiyor ama tamamen dürüst olmadığı da belli oluyor. Suçlanana bakış şekli; insanın gerçek düşmanına duyduğu türden, eski ve yatıştırılamaz bir nefreti açığa çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman is not lying, but neither is she being completely candid. The way she looks at the accused speaks of an old, inappeasable hatred, the kind one shows to one's true enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadın yalan söylemiyor ama tamamen dürüst olmadığı da belli oluyor. Suçlanana bakış şekli; insanın gerçek düşmanına duyduğu türden, eski ve yatıştırılamaz bir nefreti açığa çıkarıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La femme ne ment pas, mais elle ne dit pas non plus toute la vérité. La haine ancienne et inextinguible pour l'accusé qui transparaît dans son regard est de celle qu'on réserve à ses véritables ennemis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman is not lying, but neither is she being completely candid. The way she looks at the accused speaks of an old, inappeasable hatred, the kind one shows to one's true enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme ne ment pas, mais elle ne dit pas non plus toute la vérité. La haine ancienne et inextinguible pour l'accusé qui transparaît dans son regard est de celle qu'on réserve à ses véritables ennemis.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Frau lügt nicht, ist aber auch nicht wirklich aufrichtig. Ihr Blick auf den Beschuldigten zeugt von einem alten, unstillbaren Hass, wie man ihn auf seinen wahren Feind empfindet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman is not lying, but neither is she being completely candid. The way she looks at the accused speaks of an old, inappeasable hatred, the kind one shows to one's true enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau lügt nicht, ist aber auch nicht wirklich aufrichtig. Ihr Blick auf den Beschuldigten zeugt von einem alten, unstillbaren Hass, wie man ihn auf seinen wahren Feind empfindet.{/n}
